Message:
After the two of us waited out
our temporary suspension
from the Academy,
I began assisting Meria
with her research.

Long ago, Derulla had once
been on the verge of ruin.
The cause remains
a mystery to this day,
and was the subject of
Meria’s research at
the Academy.

Proposing new theories,
modifying lab equipment
only to tear it apart right after,
raising plants together...

It hurts to admit, but the days
I spent with Meria weren’t
just hectic, they were fun.

Our research even includes
classified government intel,

but that doesn’t seem to
bother Meria, seeing as how
she just leaves confidential
documents out on her desk
in broad daylight.

Just as my eyes happened to
glance across the contents of
said documents, I found myself
suddenly doing a double-take.

That very moment, I heard
an explosion coming from
the Academy’s prohibited
research facility,
as an ominous-looking plant
began to break forth
from the building.
